Articles.Content: Who are you, Dara O'Brian's sister? Man that's funny XD

Google is the ultimate source of all knowledge.

Well fired off both missiles. 1st passed straight through your armor and hull and everything else lol. exploded something inside. (must have been going to fast) Second shot cracked her in half but she is still alive.

Battle of Eons Drift: Turn 2

Well fired off both missiles. 1st passed straight through your armor and hull and everything else lol. exploded something inside. (must have been going to fast) Second shot cracked her in half but she is still alive.

Battle of Eons Drift: Turn 2

Try not to hit at higher than about 300-500 m/s relative velocity. Too fast, and a small torpedo will glitch through the target.

Well fired off both missiles. 1st passed straight through your armor and hull and everything else lol. exploded something inside. (must have been going to fast) Second shot cracked her in half but she is still alive.

Battle of Eons Drift: Turn 2

Ya the small 909 jr engine is a very effective rocket for my missiles. Perhaps to effective. It's just the fact that he had his ships just under 2.3km apart. That can glitch you out if your not careful.

Hmm, the Suzaku and the Bizmark were just over 3km apart when I uploaded the persistence file.

Turn 3: http://www./download/0c6cgy4c5vbhh4h/persistent.sfs

The Bizmark's captain transferred to the Suzaku, leaving the crippled Bizmark to the AI systems onboard (Central probe core on ship). The Bizmark's AI then fired 4 SMS missiles at the ACC - Naver, Destroying a large area of armour around the captain's command deck, and completely removing the upper solar panels of the Naver. Currently, the Bizmark is slowly dying in the water, having lost almost all power generation capabilities from the earlier attack from the Naver.

The Nevar Fires its volley of two missiles at the Bismark one striking the main fuel cell killing her and the other shredding off the central top armor plat.

Battle of Eons Drift Turn 4
What no pics to show?
Pics or the kerbal gets it!
<Overloads>

Persist: http://www./download/562gqjjoz6ejfs6/persistent.sfs

The Knight of the Round fleet moved into position over Duna for combat, with the Icaruga Class Bizmark, and the Icaruga Class Suzaku moving into the battlezone. Burai Classes Gino and Anya moved into a 100km orbit to act as a Reinforcement group. The Bizmark Fired two SMS class missiles at the ACC - Naver, the first removed one engine, the second only scratched the armour plating of the Naver, and caused no visible damage. 1st turn completed for the Black Knights.

EDIT: I am simply trying to write this like a mission report, sorry if it is too close to RP.

EDIT EDIT: Updated avatar to company flag. Also, if you are interested in the naming scheme, I have named everything after the characters, mechs and groups featured in the popular anime Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion.
